items.title: Diary Entry — On the Days When You Don't Feel Strong
items.excerpt: Some days you wake up and everything feels heavier. Not because you're weak, but because you're human — and it's okay to pause.
content: Some days you wake up and everything feels heavier.
Not because you're weak, but because you're human — and it’s okay to pause.
This is a quiet reminder from Aya: rest is not failure. Rest is wisdom.

items.title: Message from the Founder
items.excerpt: A soft manifesto from Aya — a reminder of inner beauty, strength, and the birth of a global sisterhood.
content: This project was born with a quiet but deeply important purpose.
Aya is not a brand. Aya is a voice. Aya is you.
